description: I. Note of additional information from the Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs, the Home Secretary, and Defence Secretary: Consolidated guidance to intelligence officers and service personnel on the detention and interviewing of detainees overseas, and on the passing and receipt of intelligence relating to detainees. 4 p. II. Letter dated 06/07/2010 from David Cameron MP to Sir Peter Gibson regarding the independent inquiry into UK involvement with detainees in overseas counter-terrorism operations. 3 p. III. Consolidated guidance to intelligence officers and service personnel on the detention and interviewing of detainees overseas, and on the passing and receipt of intelligence relating to detainees. 16 p.
